attributes.action: Oppose the election of A. C. Blair as President of the E.U. and seek an international arrest warrant against him as a war criminal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oppose the election of A. C Blair as President of the E.U. and seek an international warrant for his arrest as a war criminal for waging an aggressive war on the state of Iraq.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
